title: Blackberry Tart with Lime Cream
ingredients: ['Shortcrust pastry', '215g plain flour', '1 pinch of salt', '100g cold butter, diced', 'grated zest of 1 lemon', 'Lime cream', 'juice of 2 limes', '80g sugar', '2 egg yolks', 'Filling', '500g frozen or fresh blackberries', '215g caster sugar', '4 heaped tablespoons cornflour', '1 tablespoon lime juice']
